about_the_game:
The original Shad'O videogame soundtrack by KaMiZoTo includes 22 orchestral tracks and 2 bonus tracks. (All in OGG and FLAC format)

Tracklist :
  • Shad'O Main Title
  • William's Mind
  • A Fight Is Coming
  • Battle Music 01
  • Battle Music 02
  • Battle Music 03
  • Battle Music 04
  • Battle Music 05
  • Something Goes Wrong
  • Impressive Encounter
  • It's Coming Back
  • Path Of Memories
  • Scrapbook
  • Special Battle
  • William's Happyness
  • William's Sadness
  • Final Fight Ahead
  • The Truth Is Beyond
  • Family Link
  • Again And Again
  • I Remember Everything
  • Credits
  • Bonus Track - Piano Walk
  • Bonus Track - Shad'O Main Title First Version
    Tracks in OGG and FLAC format will be located in the Shad'O folder within your Steam directory: [...]\Steam\steamapps\common\shadO\soundtrack
